name: Soul Link (itch) (Raven44)
description:
Submission for GMTK Game Jam.

Relevance to theme: the player can voluntarily joined together to the humans

Play as Ri, a ghost, as you try to find the way back to your grave! Balance between being a ghost and possessing a human as you wander around, dodging soul eaters and exorcist to stay alive!

*the zip folder contains the executable exe (GameJam1.exe) and the files needed for the game to run
